Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

programme.title: Семейные мелодрамы
programme.desc: Это не выдуманные истории, а реконструкция реальных событий, которые могут случиться с каждой семьей. В каждой семье свои "Семейные мелодрамы", конфликты, накопившиеся проблемы с долговыми ямами, изменами, трудными детьми и конфликтами с родителями. Какой выход из этих ситуаций, достигших наивысшего апогея, когда никто не хочет его искать? Как же тогда жить дальше? Эти фильмы не заканчиваются хэппи-эндом, но, тем не менее, они будут интересны самому широкому кругу зрителей: от самых маленьких до людей в возрасте. Сюжет фильма обычно предполагает некое размышление или обсуждение, потому что он поднимает важные философские вопросы, заставляет задуматься о понятиях "любовь", "дружба", "верность", "предательство". Помимо главной мелодраматической линии отношений героев, фильмы из подборки "Семейных мелодрам" содержат и философский, и морально-нравственный подтекст, и авторскую позицию по ключевым вопросам бытия. Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

programme.title: Extract
programme.desc: Jason Bateman, Kristen Wiig, Ben Affleck and Mila Kunis star in Mike Judges workplace comedy. Joel Reynolds (Bateman) is the founder of a company that produces and bottles flavour extracts. His marital love life has flatlined, but he cant bring himself to cheat on his wife Suzie (Wiig), until his friend Dean (Affleck) convinces him to hire a gigolo to seduce her, thus freeing Joel to also play the field. This will prove to be a worse idea than it sounds. But that will be the least of his worries, as a horrific accident in the bottling plant, a grifting employee (Kunis), an aggressive lawyer (Gene Simmons) and striking workers bring his company to its knees...

programme.title: The Recall
programme.desc: The great Wesley Snipes (Blade himself!) stars as "The Hunter" in this Mauro Borrelli (The Ghostmaker) directed film. The Recall also stars RJ Mitte (Breaking Bad), Jedidiah Goodacre (Descendants), Niko Pepaj (Awkward), Laura Maria Bilgeri (Toby Goes to Camp) and Hannah Rose May (Ballers). The movie tells the tale of five friends vacationing at a remote lake house, expecting nothing less than a good time. Unbeknownst to them, Earth is under an alien invasion and in the thralls of a mass-abduction. Director Borelli is a former collaborator of director Tim Burton and the film illustrator for blockbuster films such as Pirates of the Caribbean and Captain America. The Recall will also be shot for the new Barco Escape three-screen, panoramic theatrical format, which fully surrounds audiences and offers the ultimate immersive cinema experience. Portions of the films will also be shot in Virtual Reality.

programme.title: House Of
programme.desc: Trapped in a deserted house, nine people must play a deadly game of survival.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Tommy Lee Jones and Samuel L. Jackson star in this riveting saga of a veteran Marine who becomes the scapegoat for a mission that went tragically wrong. Faced with murder charges in a case thats been rigged against him, Col. Terry Childers (Jackson) turns to a former brother-in-arms (Jones) to defend him and uncover the truth.

programme.title: Hangman
programme.desc: Mystery movie. American mystery, produced in 2017. Retired homicide detective Ray Archer and his partner, ex FBI agent Will Ruiney, are assigned to track down a vicious serial killer, who is playing a twisted version of the childrens game Hangman.

programme.title: Saving Lincoln
programme.desc: The true story of Abraham Lincoln and his bodyguard, U.S. Marshal Ward Hill Lamon. This unique film features sets created from actual Civil War photographs.

programme.title: No Limit Kids
programme.desc: Ashton, Celeste, and Becca are three unlikely middle school outcasts who form a club in an abandoned theater. There, they meet Charlie (Bill Cobbs, Night at the Museum), a homeless man who shares their passion for musical theater. When the theater is scheduled to be torn down, the teenagers set out to save the landmark with a modern-day performance of Shakespeares Much Ado About Nothing. Along the way, the group learns to treat others with respect and stand up for their beliefs. This Dove-approved film also features Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Lee Meriwether.

programme.title: House of the Stone Monkeys
programme.desc: The action proceeds along two tracks and two time frames. We meet the boy, who lives with his mother in a Budapest apartment house, in the summer of 2012. Another boy is spending his vacation with his grandparents in the same building in the summer of 1982. The house unveils its mysterious secret to both of them.

programme.title: Suits on the Loose
programme.desc: The story of Ben Sweet (Nick Roth), an eighteen-year-old middle-class man who enrolls at the University of California, Berkeley, in 1968 to study accounting and avoid the draft. There, he plunges into a life of sex, drugs, and rock n roll, as well as political activism that turns his conservative world upside down and sets him on a path of self-discovery.

programme.title: Almost Friends
programme.desc: Charlie, a culinary genius, has lost the motivation. He doesnt know what to with his life anymore, but he knows one thing - get close to Amber. In comparison to her boyfriend, he seems to be totally unattractive, but Charlies closest friend convinces him that where theres a will theres a way.

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: Donald P. Sinclair has placed six separate gold coins in different slot machines in his casino. The lucky six who find these coins discover an opportunity of a lifetime. The chance to own $2 million. Locked up in a locker in New Mexico, these six contestants must now race each other, to be the first to the cash. There are no rules in place and everything that could possibly happen, does. Whilst, behind the scenes, Sinclairs associates are placing their bets.

programme.title: The Sandman
programme.desc: One fine morning, Benno finds sand in his bed. While he tries to ignore this at first, he soon must realize that he himself is loosing the sand. Day after day the sand increases and soon his time literally starts running short. Finally he is left no choice but to ask Sandra for help, who runs a small coffee shop under his apartment. Although Benno hates her with a passion, he started having dreams of her every night. What could Sandra and the dreams have to do with the sand?

programme.title: My Son, My Son, What Have Ye Done
programme.desc: The police are called to a murder scene and quickly discover that the murderer, the victims son, is holed up in his house with two hostages. Through a series of interviews with both the murderers fiancee and his theatre director the police piece together a picture of a man losing touch with reality.

programme.title: When Do We Eat?
programme.desc: A familys Passover gets screwy after the patriarch unknowingly ingests a hit of Ecstasy.

programme.title: The Tournament
programme.desc: Every ten years in an unsuspecting town, The Tournament takes place. A battle royale between 40 of the worlds deadliest assassins. The last man standing receiving the $10,000,000 cash prize and the title of Worlds No1, which itself carries the legendary million dollar a bullet price tag. All fights are monitored 24hrs a day on redirected CCTV cameras and broadcast secretly to a ring of high stake billionaire gamblers. A gritty, multistranded action-thriller, The Tournament brings together international killers from every imaginable discipline in a blood-bathed contest to the death. We follow the competition favourites through stories of love, betrayal, revenge and redemption as they finally discover the true value of life

programme.title: Hit List
programme.desc: Charlotte is a woman with anger management issues whose therapist suggests she write a journal to keep her emotions in check. Unlucky in love, she ventures online to find a boyfriend. Just as she reaches her limit of unsuccessful dates, Charlotte meets her soul mate Lyle. Everything is perfect until Lyle finds Charlottes journal and sets out to prove just how deeply he loves her.

programme.title: Modigliani
programme.desc: American drama, produced in 2004. An American, French, German, Italian, Rumanian, and British co-production. The story of Amedeo Modiglianis bitter rivalry with Pablo Picasso, and his tragic romance with Jeanne Hebuterne.

programme.title: Uncle Nino
programme.desc: A distant, slightly dysfunctional family is brought closer together when the fathers long-estranged Uncle Nino comes from Italy to Chicago for a surprise visit.

programme.title: Scout Camp
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old York Hayes, leader of the Fire Dragon Scout Troops, returns to Camp Rahuta for his final scout camp. York has decided to take the best step of his life.

programme.title: Nico the Unicorn
programme.desc: A 12-year-old disabled boy, whose father recently passed away, has his life changed when the pony he rescues gives birth to a unicorn. Can he save the unicorn from the people who want to exploit it?

programme.title: Score: A Hockey Musical
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Farley has led a sheltered life, raised on a diet of home schooling, organic living and trips to the art gallery. To his parents dismay, Farley loves to play hockey with the local kids. To their even greater dismay, Farley is scouted and signed by the owner of a junior league team, where he becomes an instant star. But Farley discovers that stardom comes with a price - including the expectation to fight on the ice. Throw in a changing relationship with his best friend, and Farley finds himself losing his way.

programme.title: 10 Things We Should Do Before We Break Up
programme.desc: Abigail, a self-sufficient single mom meets Ben. They both think every great relationship ends in disaster. On the first date they come up with 10 things to do together before they break up. But the estimated end is not so sure - because fate adds #11 to their list.

programme.title: Lost in Florence
programme.desc: A heartbroken American in Florence gets involved in a dangerous local sport -- and with an alluring local woman.

programme.title: Corner Office
programme.desc: As Orson, The Authoritys newest employee, finds himself trapped in the absurdities of corporate life, his alienation deepens when he discovers a room hes told doesnt exist.

programme.title: Headwinds
programme.desc: Based on Olivier Adams bestselling novel, "Des Vents Contraires," it tells the story of Paul. Since his wife, Sarah, disappeared without a trace, Paul lives alone with his two young children. But a year has passed, a year in which he had to reinvent himself every day—and Paul is exhausted.

programme.title: Operation Chromite
programme.desc: During the Korean War, General MacArthur sends a spy team on a covert operation to a command center of the North Korean army. The plan: to obtain intel to prepare for the invasion of the port of Incheon.

programme.title: The Groomsmen
programme.desc: A 30-something man decides to marry his pregnant girlfriend and asks his four best friends to stand with him at the wedding, but as he observes his friends relationship troubles, he wrestles with issues of fatherhood, marriage and growing up.

programme.title: Unexpected
programme.desc: Bob and Amy are at a crossroads: she wants to adopt a child, he doesnt. Will renovating their house and rescuing animals solve their problems? Will their new handyman and his sons pregnant girlfriend be the miracle theyre looking for?...

programme.title: Absentia
programme.desc: Tricias husband Daniel has been missing for seven years. Her younger sister Callie comes to live with her as the pressure mounts to finally declare him "dead in absentia." As Tricia sifts through the wreckage and tries to move on with her life, Callie finds herself drawn to an ominous tunnel near the house. As she begins to link it to other mysterious disappearances, it becomes clear that Daniels presumed death might be anything but "natural." The ancient force at work in the tunnel might have set its sights on Callie and Tricia ... and Daniel might be suffering a fate far worse than death in its grasp.

programme.title: Muļķu nauda
programme.desc: Parasts puisis iegulda savus iekrājumus videospēļu veikala GameStop akcijās un sāk par to rakstīt internetā. Kad viņa ieraksti sociālajos tīklos kļūst aizvien populārāki, un akciju tēma kļūst par kustību, visi kļūst bagāti - līdz pretī cīnīties sāk miljardieri.

programme.title: Aizņemos līgavaini
programme.desc: Reičela ir 30 gadus veca advokāte, kura jau kopš bērnības upurējusies savas labākās draudzenes Dārsijas labā. Dārsija ir enerģiska un vienmēr pozitīva – pilnīgs pretstats nosvērtajai un nopietnajai Reičelai. Dārsija plāno precēties ar Deksu – Reičelas bijušo studiju biedru un puisi, kuru viņa jau vairākus gadus slepus mīl. Dažus mēnešus pirms kāzām Reičela un Dekss atkal satiekas, un Dekss sāk domāt par to, vai ir izvēlējies īsto meiteni. Taču vecāki uzstāj, ka viņam jāprecas pat tad, ja topošo sievu nemīl. Pa to laiku Reičelas otrs labākais draugs Ītans cenšas viņu pārliecināt, ka nevajag atteikties no laimes.

programme.title: Slow TV
programme.desc: Pavasaris ziedos.

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone filmām.

programme.title: Muļķu nauda
programme.desc: Parasts puisis iegulda savus iekrājumus videospēļu veikala GameStop akcijās un sāk par to rakstīt internetā. Kad viņa ieraksti sociālajos tīklos kļūst aizvien populārāki, un akciju tēma kļūst par kustību, visi kļūst bagāti - līdz pretī cīnīties sāk miljardieri.

programme.title: Supergriboši
programme.desc: Jebkurā parastā skolā Setu, Evanu un Fogeli sauktu par jefiņiem. Starp citu - tā pieņemts uzskatīt arī viņu skolā. Sets spēj runāt un domāt tikai par seksu, Evans ir pārāk jauks un godīgs, bet Fogelis ir vienkārši katastrofa. Katram no viņiem ir sava sapņu meitene un lieli dzīves plāni, taču parasti viņi pavada laiku, skatoties porno un graužot popkornu vai cepot dārzā desiņas kopā ar vecākiem. Līdz brīdim, kad Seta pielūgtā meitene uzaicina viņus uz tīņu ballīti, dodot līdz šim svarīgāko uzdevumu viņu dzīvē - sagādāt alkoholu.

programme.title: Aizņemos līgavaini
programme.desc: Reičela ir 30 gadus veca advokāte, kura jau kopš bērnības upurējusies savas labākās draudzenes Dārsijas labā. programme.title: Skārdnieks, drēbnieks, zaldāts, spiegs
programme.desc: Balstoties uz klasisku stāstu ar identisku nosaukumu, filma stāsta par Aukstā kara gadiem 20.gadsimta vidū. Džordžs Smailijs - bijušais spiegs - tiek noalgots no valdības puses. Ir aizdomas, ka Britu izlūkdienastam ir dubultspiegs.

programme.title: Uz nažiem
programme.desc: Uzreiz pēc astoņdesmit piektās jubilejas nogalināts detektīvromānu autors un kuplas ģimenes patriarhs Harlans Trombijs. Slepkavības izmeklēšanu uzsāk harizmātiskais un skrupulozais detektīvs Benuā Blanks, kuram acumirklī kļūst skaidrs – slepkavību ir pastrādājis kāds no Trombija plašās ģimenes locekļiem. Bet kurš tieši? Atjautības spēle uz dzīvību un nāvi ir sākusies!

programme.title: Trauksmes signāls
programme.desc: Filmā vēstīts par korumpētu policistu grupu, kas nokļuvusi mafijas šantāžas tīklā. Iebiedējot un šantažējot reiz paklupušus policistus, ļaundari piespiež viņus pastrādāt noziegumu pēc nozieguma. Plānojot lielu aplaupīšanu, policisti izšķiras novākt vienu no saviem kolēģiem.

programme.title: Skārdnieks, drēbnieks, zaldāts, spiegs
programme.desc: Balstoties uz klasisku stāstu ar identisku nosaukumu, filma stāsta par Aukstā kara gadiem 20.gadsimta vidū. Džordžs Smailijs - bijušais spiegs - tiek noalgots no valdības puses. Ir aizdomas, ka Britu izlūkdienastam ir dubultspiegs.

programme.title: Uz nažiem
programme.desc: Uzreiz pēc astoņdesmit piektās jubilejas nogalināts detektīvromānu autors un kuplas ģimenes patriarhs Harlans Trombijs. Slepkavības izmeklēšanu uzsāk harizmātiskais un skrupulozais detektīvs Benuā Blanks, kuram acumirklī kļūst skaidrs – slepkavību ir pastrādājis kāds no Trombija plašās ģimenes locekļiem. Bet kurš tieši? Atjautības spēle uz dzīvību un nāvi ir sākusies!

programme.title: Tenet
programme.desc: Bruņojies tikai ar vārdu "Tenet" un cīnoties par visas pasaules izdzīvošanu, CIP aģents dodas ceļojumā cauri starptautiskās spiegošanas krēslas pasaulei globālā misijā, kas risinās ārpus reālā laika robežām.

programme.title: Meitene vilcienā
programme.desc: Savā ikdienas braucienā uz Ņujorku nesen šķirtā Reičela Vatsone (Emīlija Blanta) gremdējas fantāzijās par māju, kurā viņa dzīvoja kopā ar bijušo vīru Tomu (Džastins Terū). Viņa ierauga jauno iedzīvotāju Meganu (Heiliju Benetu), kura ir satriecoši skaista sieviete un iemieso visu, ko Reičela jūt, ka ir zaudējusi. Atrodoties vilcienā, viņa ierauga vardarbīgu strīdu starp Meganu un vīru Skotu (Lūks Evanss). Reičela steidzas izkāpt no vilciena, taču viņai ir atmiņas zudums, iespējams, alkohola lietošanas dēļ. Viņa attopas asiņaina un klāta ar nobrāzumiem. Kad kļūst skaidrs, ka Megana ir pazudusi, viņa tiek ievilkta bīstamā intrigu un noslēpumu pasaulē, kas priekšpilsētā slēpta apkārtējo skatieniem.

programme.title: Guči nams
programme.desc: Filmas pamatā ir patiess stāsts par itāļu modes impēriju radījušo Guči dinastiju. Patrīcija Redžani ieprecas Guči ģimenē. Viņas nevaldāmā godkāre sāk graut dzimtas mantojumu, kā arī izraisa nodevības, pagrimuma un pat slepkavību virpuli. Filmas scenārijs veidots, balstoties uz 2001. gadā izdoto grāmatu "Guči nams: sensacionāls stāsts par slepkavību, ārprātu, greznību un alkatību". Galvenajās omās: Lady Gaga, Adams Draivers, Džeremijs Aironss, Als Pačino

programme.title: Tenet
programme.desc: Bruņojies tikai ar vārdu "Tenet" un cīnoties par visas pasaules izdzīvošanu, CIP aģents dodas ceļojumā cauri starptautiskās spiegošanas krēslas pasaulei globālā misijā, kas risinās ārpus reālā laika robežām.

programme.title: Slow TV
programme.desc: Miglainais mežs.

programme.title: 20. gadsimta sievietes
programme.desc: Trīs sievietes, trīs stāsti, trīs likteņi - triju paaudžu ekrāna dīvas Anete Beninga, Elle Faninga un Grēta Gērviga dzīvā un optimistiskā stāstā par sievietēm pagājušā gadsimta 70-to gadu Kalifornijā.

programme.title: Neatklātie ieraksti
programme.desc: Rozannai jeb Rozai pēc 50 gadiem ir jāpamet psihiatriskā klīnika, ko sieviete sauc par mājām visus šos gadus. Roza atsakās vietu pamest. Kad pie viņas ierodas ārsts Viljams Grīns, viņš uzzina, ka Roza piekopj savādus ikdienas rituālus un ilgus gadus rakstījusi dienasgrāmatu ar kodētiem ierakstiem. Jaunā Roza Otrā pasaules kara laikā ir zaudējusi savu māti un negaidīti iemīlas lidotājā. Tomēr Rozu pašu nolūkojis vietējais priesteris. Savstarpējās attiecības kļūst sarežģītas. Pēc daudziem gadiem slēptā patiesība pamazām atklājas Rozas dienasgrāmatu ierakstos. Galvenās lomas atveidotāja ir Rūnija Mara, amerikāņu aktrise, divu "Oskara" balvu nominante, arī viņas māsa Keita Mara ir aktrise un popularitāti guva ar Zojas lomu politiskajā detektīvseriālā "Kāršu namiņš" kopā ar Kevinu Speisiju un Robinu Raitu. Rūnija Mara atveidojusi lomas tādās filmās kā "Meitene ar pūķa tetovējumu", "Blakusefekts", "Kerola". Īru režisors Džims Šeridans ir veidojis tādas filmas kā "Mana kreisā kāja", "Brāļi", "Bokseris". Karjeras laikā nominēts sešiem "Oskariem" kā labākais režisors un scenārija autors. Lomās: Rūnija Mara, Vanesa Redgreiva, Teo Džeimss, Eidans Tērners, un citi. Rež: Džims Šeridans

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone Plus?

programme.title: Slow TV
programme.desc: Saulriets un zveja.

programme.title: 20. gadsimta sievietes
programme.desc: Trīs sievietes, trīs stāsti, trīs likteņi - triju paaudžu ekrāna dīvas Anete Beninga, Elle Faninga un Grēta Gērviga dzīvā un optimistiskā stāstā par sievietēm pagājušā gadsimta 70-to gadu Kalifornijā.

programme.title: Mans karalis. Drāma
programme.desc: Pēc nopietnas slēpošanas traumas Tonija nonākusi rehabilitācijas centrā. Atkarīga no medicīnas personāla un pretsāpju līdzekļiem, viņa velta laiku, lai atcerētos vētraino mīlasstāstu, ko piedzīvoja kopā ar Džordžio.

programme.title: Neatklātie ieraksti
programme.desc: Rozannai jeb Rozai pēc 50 gadiem ir jāpamet psihiatriskā klīnika, ko sieviete sauc par mājām visus šos gadus. Roza atsakās vietu pamest. Kad pie viņas ierodas ārsts Viljams Grīns, viņš uzzina, ka Roza piekopj savādus ikdienas rituālus un ilgus gadus rakstījusi dienasgrāmatu ar kodētiem ierakstiem. Jaunā Roza Otrā pasaules kara laikā ir zaudējusi savu māti un negaidīti iemīlas lidotājā. Tomēr Rozu pašu nolūkojis vietējais priesteris. Savstarpējās attiecības kļūst sarežģītas. Pēc daudziem gadiem slēptā patiesība pamazām atklājas Rozas dienasgrāmatu ierakstos. Galvenās lomas atveidotāja ir Rūnija Mara, amerikāņu aktrise, divu "Oskara" balvu nominante, arī viņas māsa Keita Mara ir aktrise un popularitāti guva ar Zojas lomu politiskajā detektīvseriālā "Kāršu namiņš" kopā ar Kevinu Speisiju un Robinu Raitu. Rūnija Mara atveidojusi lomas tādās filmās kā "Meitene ar pūķa tetovējumu", "Blakusefekts", "Kerola". Īru režisors Džims Šeridans ir veidojis tādas filmas kā "Mana kreisā kāja", "Brāļi", "Bokseris". Karjeras laikā nominēts sešiem "Oskariem" kā labākais režisors un scenārija autors. Lomās: Rūnija Mara, Vanesa Redgreiva, Teo Džeimss, Eidans Tērners, un citi. Rež: Džims Šeridans

programme.title: 20. gadsimta sievietes
programme.desc: Trīs sievietes, trīs stāsti, trīs likteņi - triju paaudžu ekrāna dīvas Anete Beninga, Elle Faninga un Grēta Gērviga dzīvā un optimistiskā stāstā par sievietēm pagājušā gadsimta 70-to gadu Kalifornijā.

programme.title: Mans karalis. Drāma
programme.desc: Pēc nopietnas slēpošanas traumas Tonija nonākusi rehabilitācijas centrā. Atkarīga no medicīnas personāla un pretsāpju līdzekļiem, viņa velta laiku, lai atcerētos vētraino mīlasstāstu, ko piedzīvoja kopā ar Džordžio.

programme.title: Rītdienas cilvēks
programme.desc: Eds Hemslers savu dzīvi pavada, gatavojoties katastrofai, kas varētu nepienākt. Ronija Meisnere savu dzīvi veltījusi, pērkot lietas, kuras visdrīzāk nekad neizmantos. Šie divi cilvēki mēģinās atrast mīlestību.

programme.title: Aiz kraujas rudzu laukā
programme.desc: "Aiz kraujas rudzu laukā" ir ieskats notikumos, kas veidoja vienu no pretrunīgākajiem un noslēpumainākajiem amerikāņu rakstniekiem – Dž. D. Selindžeru. Filmas darbība risinās 20. gadsimta vidū Ņujorkā, kad jaunais Selindžers meklē savu vietu dzīvē. Pārciestais frontē 2. Pasaules karā, mīlas dēka ar augstāko aprindu jaunkundzi Ūnu ONīlu un pirmie literārie centieni – šī pieredze ir pamatā viņa pasaulē, iespējams, slavenākajam literārajam meistardarbam "Uz kraujas rudzu laukā". Galvenās lomas atveido jaunais britu aktieris Nikolass Holts un sevi jau pierādījušais ASV kino meistars Kevins Speisijs.

programme.title: Pilnīgi nesaderīgi
programme.desc: Filma balstīta uz patiesiem notikumiem. Kāds izbijis noziedznieks Dells, būdams probācijas uzraudzībā, meklē fiktīvu darbu, lai atšūtu savu probācijas uzraugu. Tomēr plāni nojūk, jo smagi paralizētais Filips patiešām nolemj viņu pieņemt darbā par aprūpētāju. Viņi tiešām ir pilnīgi nesaderīgi, bet tas nostrādā abiem par labu, jo Dells ar savu pārdrošumu un aizrautību izrauj Filipu no dzīves apātijas, bet Dells iegūst labu draugu, lai gan arī viņam dzīvē nemaz tik viegli nav klājies... Braiena Krenstona nosvērtais šarms un Kevina Hārta eksplozīvais raksturs un nepārspējamais humors rada unikālu saspēli, kas ievelk ikvienu skatītāju aizraujošā stāsta virpuļos.

programme.title: Piedošana
programme.desc: Ir svelmaina 1935. gada Anglijas vasara. Kāda turīga ģimene pulcējas savā muižā, lai pavadītu laiskas brīvdienas. Gaisā virmo nojautas par gaidāmo Otro pasaules karu, kas atstās nedzēšamas pēdas cilvēku dzīvē. Galveno varoņu Sesīlijas Talisas un Robija Tērnera likteni traģiskā virpulī sagriež Sesīlijas jaunākās māsas Brionijas netaisni celtā apsūdzība, vainojot Robiju par noziegumu, kuru viņš nav pastrādājis. Aizkustinošs stāsts par mīlestību, kaislību, nodevību un piedošanu Filma saņēmusi septiņas Amerikas Kinoakadēmijas balvas nominācijas un septiņas "Zelta globusa" nominācijas, kā arī Amerikas Kinoakadēmijas balvu kategorijā "Labākā oriģinālmūzika". Filma uzņemta pēc Īana Makjūena romāna "Piedošana" motīviem.

programme.title: Pussagrūšana
programme.desc: Pēc vīra nāves Hanna mēģina turpināt dzīvi. Viņa raksta grāmatu par savu vīru, kurš bijis populārs mūziķis, kad negaidīti viņas dzīvē uzrodas pašpārliecināts rakstnieks Endrjū no Ņujorkas, kuram ir cits skatījums uz Hannas vīra dzīvi un arī nāvi. Abu iepazīšanās nesākas uz tās patīkamākās nots, taču kas zina - kā izvērsīsies. Galvenajās lomās: Rebeka Hola, Džeisons Sudeikis, Blaita Danere

programme.title: Lepnums un aizspriedumi
programme.desc: Keira Naitlija, Metjū Makfeidens un Donalds Sazerlends pasaulslavenajā Džeinas Ostinas romāna "Lepnums un aizspriedumi" ekranizējumā! Anglija, 18.gadsimta beigas. Piecas māsas Benetas - Elizabete, Džeina, Lidija, Mērija un Kitija aug mātes stingrā uzraudzībā, kura par savu galveno uzdevumu uzskata atrast meitām preciniekus un nodrošināt viņu nākotni. Tomēr enerģiskā un inteliģentā Elizabete tiecas dzīvē sasniegt ko vairāk un savos centienos jūt arī tēva atbalstu. Kad netālajā kaimiņu rezidencē ierodas bagātais vecpuisis Binglija kungs, Benetu mājās sākas rosība. Pavisam drīz Elizabete nejauši sastop pievilcīgo un, kā drīz atklājas, arī snobisko Dārsija kungu.

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone Plus?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone Plus filmām.

programme.title: Selena + Restaurant
programme.desc: Selena Gomez and Shirley Chung make a fusion version of a beloved childhood dish. Later, Selena tries to deliver a dish good enough for the Ms Chis menu.

programme.title: Selena + Chef: Home For the Holidays
programme.desc: Selena and Chef Claudette Zepeda prepare a Mexican festive feast. They make roast ham with salsa matcha and a Mexican twist on a historic salad.

programme.title: Santas Baking Blizzard
programme.desc: Combining edibility and artistry, Americas best bakers team up with expert ice sculptors to create phenomenal Christmas-themed cakes. Hosted by Casey Webb, who presents each episodes teams with their tricky challenges, the series pushes these bakers talents to the limit, as each team hopes to impress the judges and move on to the finale, where a whopping $25,000 is up for grabs.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Holiday Baking Championship
programme.desc: The search to find the greatest holiday baker begins as eight amateur bakers enter the kitchen, where they show off their family traditions and superb baking skills. To survive the challenges from week to week, they must prove their abilities in front of our tough-love judges: Duff Goldman, Nancy Fuller and Lorraine Pascale. Hosted by Bobby Deen, this baking championship is the sweetest way to celebrate this holiday season.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: Holiday Baking Championship
programme.desc: The search to find the greatest holiday baker begins as eight amateur bakers enter the kitchen, where they show off their family traditions and superb baking skills. To survive the challenges from week to week, they must prove their abilities in front of our tough-love judges: Duff Goldman, Nancy Fuller and Lorraine Pascale. Hosted by Bobby Deen, this baking championship is the sweetest way to celebrate this holiday season.

programme.title: Christmas Cookie Challenge
programme.desc: Reality competition for the festive period. A group of talented bakers hope to impress the judges with their Christmas cookies as they face a series of themed challenges. The judges will be looking for inventiveness, decorating skills and, of course, deliciously baked Christmas cookies. Whoever can wow the judges and blow away the competition will take home a huge cash prize.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: After more than 20 nonstop hours, the final chefs must create an elevated lunch and dinner to win $75,000 and the winning title!

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Holiday Wars
programme.desc: Hosted by Jonathan Bennett, Holiday Wars is a creative game show where three teams of confectionary connoisseurs demonstrate their astonishing talents by crafting mind-boggling, edible displays. Each episode presents new holiday-themed challenges for the teams to complete, as they use their culinary prowess to produce mesmerising, delicious displays.

programme.title: Vindrivera
programme.desc: Sniegotā līdzenumā indiāņu rezervātā "Vindrivera" pēddzinis un mednieks Korijs Lamberts atrod jaunas sievietes līķi. Kad autopsijā atklājas, ka sieviete tikusi izvarota, vietējais šerifs lūdz FIB palīdzību. Lai izmeklētu notikušo, no Lasvegasas uz indiāņu rezervātu tiek nosūtīta FIB aģente Džeina Benere. Drīz atklājas, ka viņa ieradusies nesagatavota - gan skarbajam apvidum, gan gaidāmajai cīņai par patiesību un izdzīvošanu.

programme.title: Kliko kundze
programme.desc: Pēc vīra pāragrās nāves Barba Nikola Ponsardēna Kliko pretstatā pieņemtajām normām pārņem jaunā vīndarīšanas uzņēmuma grožus, ko abi ar vīru bija veidojuši. Vadot uzņēmumu cauri politiskām un finanšu grūtībām, viņa ignorē kritiķus un rada revolūciju šampanieša industrijā, kļūstot par vienu no pasaules pirmajām, dižajām darījumu sievietēm. Filmas pamatā ir Tilaras Dž. Maceo "The New York Times" bestsellers "Atraitne Kliko".

programme.title: Nerunā ļaunu
programme.desc: Kad amerikāņu ģimene tiek uzaicināta pavadīt nedēļas nogali idilliskā lauku īpašumā, kas pieder jaukai britu ģimenei, ar ko viņi iepazinās atvaļinājumā, viss sākas kā bezrūpīgas sapņu brīvdienas un drīz pārvēršas urdošā psiholoģiskā murgā.

programme.title: Misija: Titāns
programme.desc: Psiholoģiskajā trillerī "Misija: Titāns" ar Keisiju Afleku un Lorensu Fišbērnu galvenajās lomās elitāru astronautu trio dodas gadiem ilgā, iespējams, kompromitētā misijā uz Saturna mēnesi Titānu. Kad ekipāža gatavojas veikt ļoti bīstamo paātrinājumu, kas tos var nogādāt pie Titāna vai arī aizsūtīt dziļi kosmosā, vienam astronautam kļūst arvien grūtāk saglabāt saikni ar realitāti.

programme.title: Džūdija
programme.desc: Biogrāfiska drāma par izcilās ASV dziedātājas un aktrises Džūdijas Gārlendas dzīvi. Gārlenda 1968. gadā, gadu pirms savas nāves, devās uz Eiropu, lai koncertētu Londonā. Filmā attēloti pēdējie mēneši kinozvaigznes dzīvē, pirms viņa izdarīja pašnāvību.

programme.title: Grāmatu zagle
programme.desc: Filma "Grāmatu zagle", kuras pamatā ir pasaulē populārs romāns, ir stāsts par neparastu, enerģisku meiteni, kuru Otrā pasaules kara laikā Vācijā nosūta dzīvot audžuģimenē. Meiteni ieintriģē vienīgā grāmata, ko viņa paņēmusi līdzi, tāpēc viņa sāk kolekcionēt grāmatas. Ar savu jauno vecāku un zem kāpnēm mītošā slepenā viesa palīdzību meitene iemācās lasīt un izveido brīnumainu pasauli, kas iedvesmo viņus visus.

programme.title: Singstrīta
programme.desc: Dublina, 1985. gads. Ekonomiskā krīze Īrijā arvien vairāk cilvēku iedzen bankrotā, tikmēr 15 gadus vecais Konors kopā ar brāli un māsu dzīvo pie vecākiem, kuru laulībai draud izjukšana. Lai ietaupītu naudu, Konoram nākas mainīt skolu. Tur viņš ātri vien kļūst par izstumto. Kādu dienu viņš pamana Rafīnu, kura šad tad stāv iepretim skolai, raudzīdamās tālumā un smēķēdama vienu cigareti pēc otras. Viņa ir skaista, divus gadus vecāka par Konoru, viņai ir draugs, un viņa strādā par modeli. Īsāk sakot: viņa ir gandrīz nesasniedzama. Taču Konors nav gatavs padoties un piedāvā meitenei piedalīties viņa grupas videoklipā. Rafīna piekrīt, un Konors ir panikā, jo grupas viņam nemaz nav...

programme.title: Pie visa vainīga mīlestība
programme.desc: Sekmīgais uzņēmējs Žoslēns ir patmīlīgs, no sevis noguris brunču mednieks. Iekarojot sieviešu uzmanību, pavedējam nav šķēršļu. Lai savaldzinātu jaunu skaistu medicīnas māsu, viņš izliekas par invalīdu, kam uz mūžu lemts palikt ratiņkrēslā. Viņa savukārt iepazīstina viņu ar savu māsu, kura patiešām pārvietojas ratiņkrēslā. Notiek kas savāds... Kad jūtas gūst virsroku, Žoslēns pats kļūst par krāpšanās upuri - atklāt patiesību ir arvien grūtāk.

programme.title: Varenais Ričards
programme.desc: Zvirbulis Ričijs kopš dzimšanas pieņemts stārķu ģimenē, visi viņu ļoti mīl, viņš ātri aug un jūtas kā īsts stārķis. Taču gājputniem stārķiem pienāk laiks lidot uz Āfriku, lai tur ziemotu. Ģimene ir spiesta atklāt Ričijam viņa izcelšanos, jo lidot kopā nedrīkst – grūtajā ceļojumā zvirbulis var iet bojā. Drosminieks negrasās nolaist spārnus un nolemj visiem pierādīt, ka ir īsts stārķis. Ričijs viens pats dodas ceļā, un viņam pievienojas jauni draugi – pūce Olga un papagailis Kiki.

programme.title: Karalisks piedāvājums
programme.desc: 2010. gadā pirms Arābu pavasara izmisušam amerikāņu tirgonim Alanam (Toms Henks) pēc mājas zaudēšanas un šķiršanās no sievas dzīvē ir iestājusies krīze. Izmisīgi cenšoties atgūt atpakaļ savu sievu, viņš dodas uz Saūda Arābiju, lai valdībai pārdotu hologrāfisku telekonferences sistēmu. Cieši apņēmies noslēgt līgumu un nepalikt uz sēkļa brūkošā ekonomikā, viņš mācās, kā izturēties svešā kultūrā ar taksometra vadītāja (Aleksandrs Bleks) un vietējā ārsta palīdzību (Sarita Čodrija)

programme.title: Viens pats mājās
programme.desc: Ziemassvētku brīvdienās dodoties uz Parīzi, Makkalisteru ģimene nejauši aizmirst mājās savu astoņgadīgo dēlu Kevinu. Tiesa, tas zēnam neliedz sarīkot pašam savas Ziemassvētku svinības. Beidzot viņu neviens vairs nekomandē, neierobežo un nepieskata! Viss būtu ideāli, ja vien rūdītie kramplauži Harijs un Mārvs nebūtu ieplānojuši apzagt visas tuvākās apkaimes mājas pašā svētku vakarā.

programme.title: Viens pats mājās
programme.desc: Iepriekšējos Ziemassvētkos, dodoties brīvdienās uz Franciju, Makkalisteri aizmirsa mājās savu jaunāko atvasi Kevinu. Šogad, dodoties uz Floridu, viņi dēlu pazaudē lidostā. Kamēr ģimene lido uz Maiami, Kevins ar tēva kredītkartēm kabatā ir ceļā uz Ņujorku. Lielajā pilsētā viņš atrod jaunus draugus, iekārtojas lepnākajā viesnīcā un sastop arī savus vecos paziņas – divus aprobežotos kramplaužus. Šoreiz abi ļaundari Ziemassvētku vakarā plāno apzagt lielāko rotaļlietu veikalu Ņujorkā. Turklāt viņi jau sen alkst atriebties Kevinam – zēnam, kura dēļ nonāca cietumā.

programme.title: Zaķu skola: Misija Olas
programme.desc: Īsi pirms Lieldienām svinīgā rituālā maģiskā Zelta ola palīdz noskaidrot zaķu čempionus. Un pirmo reizi zaķu skolas vēsturē izvēlēts arī pilsētas zaķis - un tas ir Makss! Vaļoties Maksam vairs itin nemaz nav laika, jo viņam kopā ar Lieldienu zaķa draugiem jāpilnveido savas prasmes. Tomēr pirms paša pirmā treniņa zaķu maģiskā spēka avots Zelta ola kļūst melna. Pie vainas ir bandas vadonis Leo, kurš nevēlas, lai Lieldienas notiku. Ko nu?!

programme.title: Killera sievas miesassargs
programme.desc: Miesassargs Maikls Braiss beidzot var atviegloti uzelpot. Trakais killers Dariuss Kinkeids, kurš piebeidzis veselu baru ļaužu visā pasaulē, nu ir nozudis. Saule, mīļākā grāmata un ne domas par Kinkeidu – ko gan vēl varētu vēlēties, lai atgūtu formu. Taču tad pludmalē uzrodas līdz matu galiem apbruņotā Kinkeida sieva Sonja, un viņai ir sliktas ziņas – Kinkeids ir Itālijā, viņu nolaupījuši teroristi un tie ir jāiznīcina!

programme.title: Cietais rieksts
programme.desc: Pirmo reizi Džons Makleins nonāk svešā teritorijā, kad ierodas Maskavā palīdzēt savam ietiepīgajam dēlam Džekam, nezinot, ka patiesībā dēls ir lieliski sagatavots CIP darbinieks, kuram jāaptur kodolieroču zādzība. Cīnoties ar krievu noziedzniekiem un cenšoties novērst kara sākumu, abi Makleini atklāj, ka viņu atšķirīgās darba metodes padara viņus par neapturamiem varoņiem.

programme.title: Es, Tonija
programme.desc: Asās un satīras piepildītās biogrāfiskās drāmas pamatā ir daiļslidotājas Tonijas Hārdingas dzīvesstāsts un viņas saistība ar 1994. gada uzbrukumu savai sāncensei Nensijai Keriganai. Tonija ir mežonīga un ambicioza, viņa nebaidās iet pretī straumei, panākt, ka viņu ienīst, un iegūt visas medaļas daiļslidošanas pasaulē. Bet viņas māte jau kopš bērnības meitu ir audzinājusi stingri un pat nežēlīgi. Taču pienāk brīdis, kad Tonijai ir jāapzinās savas rīcības sekas un piespiedu kārtā jāizstājas no sporta pasaules, kas ir visa viņas dzīve. 90. Kinoakadēmijas balvas pasniegšanas ceremonijā Tonijas mātes lomas atveidotāja Elisone Dženija saņēma balvu nominācijā "Labākā aktrise otrā plāna lomā", tāpat filma tika izvirzīta nominācijās "Labākā aktrise galvenajā lomā" (Mārgo Robija) un "Labākā montāža".

programme.title: Zudušajās zemēs
programme.desc: Karaliene sūta vareno un bīstamo burvi Greju Alisu uz rēgainajiem Zudušo Zemes mežonīgajiem plašumiem meklēt maģisku spēku, kur burvei un viņas pavadonim, klejotājam Boisam, jāapspēlē un jāpārspēj gan cilvēki, gan dēmoni.

programme.title: Rūķi
programme.desc: Hloja un viņas mamma pārvācas – jau ATKAL! Turklāt viņas pārvācas uz necilu, vecu māju, kas pilna ar dārza rūķiem. Drīz Hloja gan atklāj, ka šī māja slēpj biedējošu noslēpumu. Kādu dienu pēc skolas Hloja kopā ar kaimiņu Liamu atklāj, ka rūķi patiesībā ir dzīvi! Kā izrādās, jau gadiem rūķi ir sargājuši planētu no draudīgiem maziem monstriem, kuri iebrukuši mājā caur portālu, kas ved uz citu pasauli. Kad vienīgais līdzeklis, kas varētu palīdzēt uzveikt monstrus, skolā nonāk nepareizajās rokās, Hlojai un Liamam jāsadarbojas ar rūķiem, lai cīnītos pret mazo negantnieku iebrukumu un glābtu pasauli!

programme.title: Atmiņas par nākotni
programme.desc: gadā, laužot pieņēmumus par sievieti tā laika sabiedrībā, Vera Britena kļūst par Somervilas koledžas studenti Oksfordā. Sākoties Pirmajam pasaules karam, viņas brālis Edvards, līgavainis Rolands Leitons un draugi Viktors un Džefrijs tiek nosūtīti cīnīties frontes priekšējās līnijās. Arī Vera ziedojas un atstāj koledžu, lai dotos līdzi un pievienotos brīvprātīgo mediķu organizācijai, rūpējoties par ievainotajiem un mirstošajiem kareivjiem Londonā, Maltā un Francijā.

programme.title: Viens pats mājās
programme.desc: Ziemassvētku brīvdienās dodoties uz Parīzi, Makkalisteru ģimene nejauši aizmirst mājās savu astoņgadīgo dēlu Kevinu. Tiesa, tas zēnam neliedz sarīkot pašam savas Ziemassvētku svinības. Beidzot viņu neviens vairs nekomandē, neierobežo un nepieskata! Kamēr ģimene lido uz Maiami, Kevins ar tēva kredītkartēm kabatā ir ceļā uz Ņujorku. programme.title: Vilks un Lauva
programme.desc: Pēc vectēva nāves 20 gadus vecā pianiste Alma atgriežas bērnības mājās. Drīz viņas dzīvē notiek negaidīts pavērsiens. Nez no kurienes uzradusies vectēva draudzene baltā vilcene atved savu mazuli un pati nozūd. Tad netālu avarē lidmašīna, un meitene tās atlūzās atrod brīnumainā kārtā izdzīvojušu lauvēnu. Alma nolemj abus paturēt, un notiek neticamais – mazuļi kopā aug un iemīl viens otru kā brāļus. Bet idilliskā pasaule sabrūk, kad viņu noslēpums nāk gaismā.

programme.title: Bada garša
programme.desc: Kāds pāris ziedo visu, tikai lai saņemtu visaugstāko atzinību pavārmākslas pasaulē — Michelin zvaigzni.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets
programme.desc: Dienā, kad zobenzobu vāveri vajā neveiksmes un viņa gandrīz pazaudē savu lielāko dārgumu ozolzīli, visi dzīvnieki dodas ceļā uz dienvidiem, meklējot glābiņu no aukstuma, kas piemeklējis zemi. Sliņķis Sids un mamuts Manfreds par ceļabiedriem kļūst nejauši. Pēc zobenzobu tīģeru uzbrukuma cilvēku apmetnei viņi izglābj mazuli. Par to rūpes uzņemas citkārt slinkais Sids un, kaut gan diezgan negribīgi, arī Manfreds. Nospriežot, ka bērna tētis ir dzīvs, viņi dodas to meklēt. Drīz ceļiniekiem pievienojas arī zobenzobu tīģeris Djego, kura uzdevums ir mazuli nolaupīt. Tā sākas draugu aizraujošais ceļojums, kura laikā visnepiemērotākajos brīžos pie apvāršņa parādās zobenzobu vāvere Skrets, izmisīgi cenzdamies glābt savu ozolzīli.

programme.title: Bridžitas Džounsas dienasgrāmata
programme.desc: Bridžeta Džonsa ir jauna sieviete, kas pārdzīvo savu vecumu, svaru, darbu, neveiksmes privātajā dzīvē un citas nepilnības. Pienākot Jaunajam gadam, viņa apņemas beidzot sakārtot savu dzīvi, sākt rakstīt pilnīgi atklātu dienasgrāmatu. Dzīve uzņem apgriezienus, kas viņa sāk romānu ar savu bosu, kas izrādās vienkāršs brunču mednieks, un satiek otru savas dzīves vīrieti, kas izskatās diezgan garlaicīgs, tomēr ir lielisks.

programme.title: Vilka sauciens
programme.desc: Franču zemūdene ir briesmās.

programme.title: Tulkotāji
programme.desc: Deviņus tulkotājus ieslēdz bunkurā, lai viņi iztulkotu jaunu bestselleru. Visiem tā ir lieliska iespēja, bet kāds nopludina tekstu, un sapņu darbs pārvēršas par murgu.

programme.title: Balerīna
programme.desc: Slepkava, apmācīta Ruska Roma organizācijas tradīcijās, dodas atriebt tēva nāvi.

programme.title: Slepkavas kodekss
programme.desc: Kad Anna bija bērns, viņu no nāves izglāba leģendārais slepkava Mūdijs. Apguvusi sava glābēja arodu, Anna ir kļuvusi par vienu no prasmīgākajām pasūtījuma slepkavām pasaulē. Kad Mūdijs tiek nogalināts, viņa nozvēras atriebties un nogalināt to, kurš atņēmis dzīvību cilvēkam, kurš viņai iemācījis visu.

programme.title: Māceklis
programme.desc: Stāsts par meistaru un viņa mācekli Ņujorkas nekustamo īpašumu džungļos. 70. gadu sākumā Donalds Tramps ir iesācējs – kompleksu mākts lietu kārtotājs, kurš atrodas tētuka Trampa seniora pavēnī. Iepazīstoties ar advokātu Roju Konu, viņa dzīve mainās. Zogot no citiem idejas, spārnotus teicienus (arī no Reigana) un pārņemot Kona taktiku, Tramps kļūst par savu "labāko versiju". AIDS epidēmija, šovbiznesa ziedonis un itāļu marmora modernās pilis. Pilsēta, kas nekad neguļ, ir Trampa spēļu laukums – tiesa, tajā viņam pašam kļūst par šauru.

programme.title: EuroLeague. Paris Basketball - Zalgiris Kaunas
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: NHL. Columbus Blue Jackets - Florida Panthers
programme.desc: Coverage of professional ice hockey from North America.

programme.title: Futbols: Bundesliga. Koln - St. Pauli
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

Legends of this particular sport include Kobe Bryant, Michael Jordan and Kareem Abdul-Jabbar.

programme.title: LaLiga. Atletico - Valencia
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Bundesliga. St. Pauli - Heidenheim
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

First Time Fixer
programme.desc: Identical twin sisters who specialise in refinishing furniture tackle their ultimate midlife project: a century-old farmhouse in Idaho.

programme.title: The Flip Off
programme.desc: Tarek and Heather compete against his ex, Christina, to see who can out-flip the other in a main suite battle - and Christina decides to play dirty!

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous: Welcome Inn
programme.desc: Follow married couple Dave and Jenny Marrs as they undertake a challenging renovation project, transforming a 19th century historic home into a bed and breakfast. As soon as they saw the property in Bentonville, Arkansas the idea was born. The financial stakes are high, as the place has been abandoned for a long time, but Dave and Jenny are determined to turn it into an inn of their dreams. Join as we follow their journey every step of the way in detail, as they face various issues, from construction to bee infestation and a lot more.

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: Kamohai and Tristyn buy their third house on the same block in Kaneohe. Its full of junk with a jungle backyard and in worse shape than they thought.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: House Hunters

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A family from Pennsylvania are fed up of shovelling snow every winter. Theyre looking for a home on the white sandy beaches in Outer Banks, North Carolina.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A couple is leaving Atlanta, Georgia, for a laid-back lifestyle on Ono Island, Alabama. Theyre looking for their dream home with a scenic water view.

programme.title: First Time Fixer
programme.desc: A couple launches their home-reno venture with a tattered suburban duplex. Theyre determined to transform it into a stunning single-family home.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.desc: Gray helps a growing family tiptoe into colour. Meanwhile, Grumpy makes the historical home more functional, adding much-needed storage.

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House
programme.desc: American home improvement series. Presenter Jasmine Roth visits the homes of DIY catastrophes to restore them back to a liveable space. Jasmine brings in the professionals to rescue these renovations-gone-wrong and helps homeowners realise their propertys full potential. With half-demolished houses, unfinished floors and plumbing nightmares: these refurbishment mishaps are on a monumental scale. Luckily, with expertise, hard work and vision, Jasmine and her team can hopefully transform these DIY disasters into something beautiful that their owners will love.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Fixer Upper
programme.desc: American reality television series. Married couple Chip and Johanna Gaines own a home renovation and redecoration service in Waco, Texas, and had worked on over 100 homes before the show. They begin with showing a hopeful couple three potential homes to purchase in central Texas, all of which require a significant amount of repair or renovation. Once the couple have chosen the home they like, Johanna designs the renovations and Chip is the lead contractor. Buyers usually have an overall budget of under $200,000 with at least $30,000 in renovations.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous: Welcome Inn

programme.title: Living Aloha

programme.title: Izzy Does It
programme.desc: Displaced by a house flood, Izzy looks to get a family back in their home in 11 weeks. The Battres team takes on a flip with a tight completion goal.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt

Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Did a loyal viewer capture an image of an alien probe? What is the identity of a creature spotted on camera? Did the legendary Men in Black call a man and threaten him? Tony Harris and his team of experts dive into these claims to find the truth.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Did a loyal viewer capture an image of an alien probe? What is the identity of a creature spotted on camera? Did the legendary Men in Black call a man and threaten him? Tony Harris and his team of experts dive into these claims to find the truth.

programme.title: Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Water
programme.desc: The team has a chance to solve the case of the USS Cyclops. Missing since 1918 with 309 sailors, this 500-foot freighter represents the single deadliest Bermuda Triangle loss. The divers race two hurricanes to investigate a new target further north.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.desc: One of the most prolific inventors of the 20th century, Nikola Tesla shepherded mankind to a new industrial era and laid the groundwork for todays technological age. Is it possible that he was influenced by some otherworldly design?

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: A UFO spotted over one of the worlds holiest sites. And could a mysterious floating "spaceman" in a famous photograph be an elaborate, decades-long hoax? Plus, "superhumans" who can stop cars barehanded.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: In small towns, and along Americas back roads, treasures are waiting to be uncovered - valuable relics from history that are hidden in junk piles, buried in barns and stacked in garages. It takes special experts to find these lost artifacts and hopefully turn rust to riches. AMERICAN PICKERS follows two of the most skilled "pickers" Mike Wolfe, owner of Antique Archaeology, and his business partner, Frank Fritz, as they hunt down objects with historical, collectible and pop culture value that have been long forgotten by their owners. Along the way, they meet people whose own stories open a window into American lives and history.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: Hazardous History With Henry Winkler
programme.desc: Snack on a feast of food horrors from the past: from radioactive energy drinks to scandalous snacks made with Olestra to the appalling additives in your milk and bread, we uncover the incredible things people once ate without a second thought.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Origins
programme.desc: The Great Pyramid of Giza remains as one of the biggest mysteries of the world, with evidence suggesting it may have been an ancient power plant. Could these structures hold the key to unraveling the truth about humanitys extraterrestrial past?

programme.title: The UnXplained: Mysteries of the Universe
programme.desc: From massive asteroids and deadly bursts of radiation to microscopic alien viruses, each cosmic dangers may end human civilization as we know it. Can we prepare for the inevitable calamity that may be coming our way? Or are we doomed to oblivion?
